page.title: 10LIFE ON A COUNCIL ESTATE
page.content:
Questions were asked at 32 houses on estates next to the School. How many people live in the house? average family size 3.5 largest family 5 smallest 2 How many members of the household are over 65? 8 out of 109 (7.3%) How many members are children under the age of 16? 40 out of 109 (36.6%) max. number of children per house=4 Does husband work? yes 72% no 22% no husband in the house 6 Does wife work? yes 41% no 56% no wife in the house 3 Do you have any pets? yes 72% no 28% dog cat bird fish rodent 57% 35% 17% 22% 4%
The survey on pages 9 and 10 was carried out by a second year Humanities group on the estates of Highcliffe,Eastcliffe,Spittal Hall.
